title: Warhammers
content: mashWeakening Strike Faithbreaker 1d10 (1d8) +1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Absolute Power: A surge of Divine energy accompanies your swing. It deals an additional 1d6 Force damage and possibly pushes your target back 5m.
